- functionality_name: AddProductToShoppingCart
- description: Add a product to the visitor’s shopping cart.
- input_parameters:
   - id: The id of the product to be added to the shopping cart.
- output_values:
   - None
- related_methods:
   - GET /Controller_shoppingCart: This method is called when the user wants to add a product to their shopping cart. It retrieves the product from the database and adds it to the shopping cart list.
   - POST /Controller_shoppingCart: This method is called when the user wants to update an existing product in their shopping cart. It retrieves the product from the database and updates it in the shopping cart list.
